reviewText: Don't let the title fool ya. It's not porn. There's been a lot of bad movies in the 80's. This is one of them. But it's a movie that has you laughing at it. Especially the bad guys when they are in pursuit of the "Ballbuster". You can tell a lot of the actors are locals that just want to make it in the industry, or friend of the people making the movie. But it's a fun watch. I suggest the beginning of the movie, when the two guys in the apartment stand in the doorway looking for a shot, but end up looking like they're dancing. HILARIOUS!
